218 
219 // protected methods
220 
221 inline i2d::CVector2d CPerspectiveCalibration::GetNormPosition(const i2d::CVector2d& viewPosition) const
222 {
223  return i2d::CVector2d(
224  (viewPosition.GetX() - m_viewCenter.GetX()) * m_pixelAngleTangents.GetX(),
225  (viewPosition.GetY() - m_viewCenter.GetY()) * m_pixelAngleTangents.GetY());
226 }
227 
228 
229 inline i2d::CVector2d CPerspectiveCalibration::GetViewPosition(const i2d::CVector2d& normPosition) const
230 {
231  return i2d::CVector2d(
232  normPosition.GetX() / m_pixelAngleTangents.GetX() + m_viewCenter.GetX(),
233  normPosition.GetY() / m_pixelAngleTangents.GetY() + m_viewCenter.GetY());
234 }
